text: 12:21 2 Korin 13:2Kɨ kamaghɨn atiati, kɨ magh mangɨtɨ faragha otozir bizir kam, ikɨvɨra ikiam. Eghtɨ God na damightɨ, kɨ ian damazibar aghumsɨzir bar dafam inigham. Kɨ kamaghɨn atiatingi, arazir kurar gumazamiziba fomɨram amiziba, me datɨrɨghɨn dagh amuavɨra iti, eghtɨ kɨ mangɨ men ganigh ua me bagh aziam. Me afiar araziba ko, pura tintinibar uari koma akuir araziba ko, aghumsɨzir puvatɨzir araziba, me da tegha navibagh irazir puvatɨ.
